trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> has a StylusPointCollection that contains <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects collected from a stylus and digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>ha un StylusPointCollection contenente <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>oggetti raccolti stilo dal digitalizzatore.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: You can use the StylusPointCollection to customize the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il StylusPointCollection per personalizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un IEnumerable generico di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> per aggiungere il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: stylusPointsis .

trans-unit.source: The length of points is 0.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza di points è 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The objects in stylusPoints have incompatible objects.
trans-unit.target: - o - oggetti stylusPoints sono incompatibili oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class with specified points.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe con punti specificati.

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un IEnumerable generico di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che specifica il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> gli oggetti da aggiungere il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: points is .
trans-unit.target: pointsis .

trans-unit.source: The length of points is 0.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza di points è 0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that may initially contain the specified number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe che può contenere inizialmente il numero specificato di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: When you use the StylusPointCollection constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, you specify it's `initialCapacity`.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza il costruttore StylusPointCollection per creare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, specificare che sia `initialCapacity`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, you can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile aggiungere più <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>oggetti chiamando le <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> can initially contain.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> può contenere inizialmente.

trans-unit.source: initialCapacity is negative.
trans-unit.target: initialCapacityè negativo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that contains the properties specified in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe che contiene le proprietà specificate nel <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects added to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that is compatible with `stylusPointDescription`.
trans-unit.target: Tutti <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>gli oggetti aggiunti al <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>deve avere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>compatibile con `stylusPointDescription`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> che specifica le proprietà aggiuntive archiviate in ogni <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stylusPointDescription is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointDescriptionis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that is the specified size and contains the properties specified in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe è la dimensione specificata e contiene le proprietà specificate nel <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> is created with the capacity to hold the specified number of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>costruttore per creare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>viene creato con la capacità per contenere il numero specificato di <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects than `initialCapacity` by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere più <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>gli oggetti di `initialCapacity` chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> che specifica le proprietà aggiuntive archiviate in ogni <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> can initially contain.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> può contenere inizialmente.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Finds the intersection of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*> property.
trans-unit.target: Trova l'intersezione dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*>

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> which describes a subset of values belonging to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>che descrive un subset di valori appartenenti al <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that intersects the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> of the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>metodo per ottenere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>che interseca il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> corrente</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Reformat method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects as those belonging to the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo riformatta restituisce una <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>che contiene gli stessi <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>oggetti come quelli che appartengono all'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> uses `subsetToReformatTo` as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>oggetti nel nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>Usa `subsetToReformatTo` <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Reformat uses the constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Riformatta utilizza vincoli dal <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>del <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>proprietà, anche se i vincoli in `subsetToReformatTo` sono diversi.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses the values 0 and 1023 for <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> whereas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> uses the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se `subsetToReformatTo` utilizza i valori 0 e 1023 per <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>mentre <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>utilizza i valori 0 e 255.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>

trans-unit.source: Reformat returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> using the values, 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Riformattare restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>utilizzando i valori 0 e 255.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> da intersecare con il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that has a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> uses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> che ha un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> vale a dire un sottoinsieme dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> che corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> utilizza.

trans-unit.source: subsetToReformatTo is not a subset of the property.
trans-unit.target: subsetToReformatTonon è un subset del proprietà.
